hyperparameters.name_of_hyperparameter_0: value in str or float - You need to play with at least two different hyperparameters so at least name_of_hyperparameter_0 and name_of_hyperparameter_1

experiment_0.description: Unique description one of the approach - it has to be different for each experiment.

experiment_1.description: Unique description two of the approach - it has to be different for each experiment.

experiment_2.description: Unique description three of the approach - it has to be different for each experiment.

final_prediction.description: Unique description four of the final results and prediction - it has to be different and here you will describe results on test dataset.
